employees.name: Danielle Vogel
employees.title: Business Owner / Web Designer
employees.desc: Opening DK Web Design was a life long desire in the making. It has allowed me to not only do what I love on a daily basis but also support causes that I deeply care about. My passion is helping people and this business allows me to do just that. Outside of work I enjoy spending down time with my husband and our two dogs, traveling, and trying as many new foods as possible!
specialites: AA in Graphic Design for Print
BS in Web Design and Interactive Media

employees.name: Dustin Smith
employees.title: Website Consultant
employees.desc: Every day is a gift and I take it as such, making sure to capture every moment. I joined DK Web Design because it has been my dream to join a company and grow with it. My goal is to find the best solution for you and make sure that you understand your options. I love my job and look forward to helping you reach your goals!

employees.name: Tiffany Smith
employees.title: Project Manager
employees.desc: Helping others is what I'm most passionate about whether it's a four-legged friend, other students on campus, or the clients I get to meet and work with! I have been working in customer service for roughly ten years and have genuinely enjoyed every moment of it. My goal as a Project Manager is to provide each of my clients a wonderful experience while maintaining a professional, comfortable, and enjoyable atmosphere. In addition to helping others, I find happiness in art which has driven my love for painting, drawing, cinema, and music.

employees.name: Juan Villalobos
employees.title: Web Developer
employees.desc: Golfer, Developer, GoPro enthusiast, and big dreamer. I live every day with a big smile on my face, and I find joy in creating minimalist, unique, easy-to-use websites. My aim is to create an experience that will engage, delight, and inspire users, leaving a lasting impression on your customers and clients.

employees.name: Bree Sears
employees.title: Web Developer
employees.desc: I have always had an interest in computers, and that interest led me to completing a degree in Computer Information Systems from Chico State University. I find web design and development to be a main area of interest for me and feel very fortunate to be employed at such a great company where I can explore my passion fully. When I'm not building websites I enjoy spending time with my wonderful family, fire dancing, and playing the cello in my spare time.

employees.name: Heather Elizabeth
employees.title: Writer/Editor
employees.desc: I have loved reading and writing ever since I was little, so it's only natural I went on to study English Literature in college. After graduating from UC Santa Barbara with a B.A. in English I realized it's truly an art to be able to utilize words and sentence structure to appeal to your audience. When I'm not working I enjoy being with family, playing piano, reading, cooking, gardening, and hanging out with my furry friends.

employees.name: Kelly Comer
employees.title: Office Admin
employees.desc: My desire to learn is insatiable. I love talking with people and learning their story; I find it very inspiring!
